tool_description: The Domain Logo Scraper API is a tool that automatically extracts a website's logo from its domain. This API allows users to retrieve a website's logo without the need for manual searching, making it a valuable resource for web developers, marketers, and designers.

api_list.name: Logo Extractor
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to extract the logo from any domain of your preference.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the website from which to extract the logo.
